categories.description: Using C# to create a software which tests assembly line control units.

categories.name: Other Jobs
categories.description: I have taught music for 8 years, first as a piano teacher for young students at Music Stadium, then as a music theory tutor at Oakland University starting in September 2022. These positions have required me to communicate complex ideas to students, and to assume a leadership role to inspire students and keep them engaged.
